16/08/2022 1837 - 1.88 - McDonalds East Gates 15/08/2022 1256 - 1.88 - McDonalds East Gates 15/08/2022 1333 - 2.50 - Poundland Leicester (assuming Gallowtree Gate) 15/08/2022 1235 - 3.50 - Tesco - 6300 - as per google - Tesco Express Welford Place, Leicester
As per DI Review - Please attend McDonalds on East Gate weekdays (commencing 18/08 between 12:00 & 18:00) - ensure staff are aware of description of Misper and that staff are aware Police will be nearby should he attend.</notes> <number>ACTION0001002</number> <report_reference>38</report_reference> <start_date>2022-08-18 07:58:00</start_date> <status>Suspended</status> <summary>false</summary> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-09-06 08:31:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cd738b8d1bf59190db301f83b24bcbb6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 10:59:47</sys_updated_on> <title>*MPT TASK* Financial Enquiries</title> <type>Financial</type> </x_snc_mispers_action_item> </record_update>
